ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, If you want to fight for control of the Allience, go for it. Just be prepared when you do. It s just that your saying that your going to attack and gloat

Hey, If you want to fight for control of the Allience, go for it. 
Just be prepared when you do. It's just that your saying that your 
going to attack and gloat over it was a bit out of the ordinary and 
unexpected. But as long as the rules are adhered to, go for it. Have 
fun.  

PLACE BETS NOW. 100 cents on the who will be the winner!
